website_summaries.verdict: Sleek and sophisticated, this triple Qi charging mat is attractive enough for home or office use.
pros: Place your phone on the Qi charging mat to power up
Charges up to three phones at a time
Works for both iPhone and Android
Includes USB, micro USB, and lightning charging ports
Comes with Qualcomm 3.0 quick charge wall adapter
Comes on when you place your phone on top of it
cons: May not charge through metal cases, magnetic cases, or popsockets

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: As other people stated, this product DOES NOT WORK. The Creator & Company are impeccable people, however I returned my product. The Device was unable to charge my Xs Max 6.5 & iPhone X at the same time. The ports are also unable to support the functions described in the description. I purchased two separate products from Best Buy: $200.00 Surge Protector & 125.00 Surge Protector. I made this purchase to see if the Device needed an "Expensive Power Supply." The product was still unable to "act as described." The look is breathtaking and the design is sleek, it doesn't work though. I wish I could've kept this product, it pains me to leave this review.
customer_reviews.author: Stead

customer_reviews.title: Just what the world needed--another device that has a flashing LED
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great about this, but when it is actually charging there is an LED that pulses green. Having the LED go from blue when a device is not being charged to green when a device is being charged makes perfect sense, and would be welcome. But what I don't need is a flashing green LED in my line of sight. That is an awful, awful idea.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: ... about a week now and everything is working just fine. I does fast charge my Samsung S7
customer_reviews.text: I've had this charger for about a week now and everything is working just fine. I does fast charge my Samsung S7. I like that the charger is pretty flat, looks great on the nightstand. I just set the phone or my wife’s on the charger, and that's it. Wireless charging is much easier since you don't have to worry with plugging and unplugging the phone, especially if you are already in bed and have to check a msg. play a couple game, or whatever else. I highly recommend this charger. With a 1 year warranty I feel covered in case anything does happen to it down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Nave Edelshtein

customer_reviews.title: Cops are here
customer_reviews.text: Flashing red and blue lights when charging. Impossible to sleep next to these bright flashing lights. Impossible to put tape over the light as it shines through the whole charger. Also charged one phone and not the other, phones got extremely hot during the night.
customer_reviews.author: LLH

customer_reviews.title: worked well for a month or two
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for 2 iPhone X phones. It worked well for the 1st month. After 1 month, one of the phones wouldn't charge anymore. After the 2nd month the other phone stopped charging. What's frustrating is that when I place the phone(s) on the charging pad at night everything seems OK (the phone displays being charged and the blue LED is flashing). In the morning though, the phone is still showing 35% charge (same as the night before) only now, as I'm ready to leave for the day, my battery is almost empty! Now both phones are being charged with wall charger.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So I ended up heaving a really nice charging station! The Apple Watch charging dock is connected to the extra USB port on the back - really helps with the cable management , I think it ended up looking super slick. The dual pad works great, you can see my phone on it charging - wish I can show you both me and my wife’s phones charging (she got a galaxy S8+) but of course I’m taking the picture with it. Overall think this is a great product, wish there was another one in black!
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Love these wireless chargers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Ibis wireless charger about 7 months ago for myself. Since I knew the product and it has worked well for me, I ordered some for my daughter and my son for Christmas. A new technology for them, and they are tech savvy I would say! The only semi-negative thing I can say about these chargers is they obviously take longer to charge than when using a wired connection plugged into the wall. Other than that, it is cute, sleek, clean. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill and Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Product By An Excellent Company!!!
customer_reviews.text: The IBIS wireless charger is very compact and charges my Samsung Note 8 very quickly. My original issue with finding just the right placement of the phone on the charger was more an issue with my particular phone and my inexperience with wireless chargers. With two phones to charge each night, this charger is a quick and easy solution to this daily chore. This charger lives up to its excellent reviews in every respect, and I would recommend it with out reservation. If you need a wireless charger for two phones, THIS is the one to get!
customer_reviews.author: PhilBob48

customer_reviews.title: Mine must be defective.
customer_reviews.text: This charger does not work as stated. I left my phone on it for 10 hours over night and I’m at 20%. It worked ever so slightly better when I very first got it, and as time goes on it gets worse. And don’t even think about Trying to charge more than one item at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Lemmy

customer_reviews.title: A gem of a charger
customer_reviews.text: We have now had this charger for over a year. It is wonderful, fast, easy to use, easy to pickup for travel, etc. No apparent slowdown when charging two devices (iPhone XS). What is amazing is that we still have 5 months on the warranty. Chargers come and go, but this seems to go on and on. The only thing we have noticed is that the LEDs are inconsistent, especially the blue one. But no effect on the charging. The price is nice, also.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger!
customer_reviews.text: The charger is sleek, and beautiful, the rubber feet on the bottom are super grippy, so it doesn't slide around, and it charges our phones like it's supposed to. The only thing it doesn't do is fast charge, (at least with our Google Pixel 3XL's) but I'm not super concerned about that, because it's our overnight charger. Would totally buy again! Ibis also has had wonderful customer service, and has been in contact from time of purchase to check in and see how it's working and ask if we need anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Requires more coordination and precision than a wired charger.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wireless charger to add ease to my life, but it's done the opposite. I wanted to simply put my phone down on the charger and fall asleep, waking up to a full charge. Instead, I wake up to a red battery status because the phone wasn't charging. As it turns out, you have to place the phone precisely in the correct spot on the charger, and it's a small target to hit. Making the problem more complicated is the charger is relatively frictionless so the vibrations form texts and emails vibrate the phone off the sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: Britton Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working about a month after we got it
customer_reviews.text: I did a copy & paste of a previous review because the same thing happened to us: "It worked well for the 1st month. After 1 month, one of the phones wouldn't charge anymore. What's frustrating is that when I place the phone(s) on the charging pad at night everything seems OK (the phone displays being charged and the blue LED is flashing). In the morning though, the phone is still showing 35% charge (same as the night before) only now, as I'm ready to leave for the day, my battery is almost empty! "
customer_reviews.author: D. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Decent charger
customer_reviews.text: I got this a bit ago and thought it was working pretty well. It seemed to charge our phone in decent timing. But after having a while it does seem to take longer for our phones to charge. Doesn’t seem as fast. You have to make sure your phone is sitting just right and the green light is blinking for it to be charging properly. Sometimes getting the right spot is difficult. On the other hand it is nice for having one less charger lying around and being able to charge both our phones at once.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Would not always work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product for my galaxy s9 and wife s8 plus. Product surface is very smooth and slippery and any movement will make phone slide off. Also is very hard to make it work, you have to perfectly align the phone and sometimes it just wont work. Also when it does works on both phones it would cut down the charging speed in half which I dont mind since they are for overnight but still, I bought a fast charging product. I still got my old samsung one that holds the phones in place and charges fast. Also it makes a weird annoying sound when charging and that LEd ligth that turns on when charging you cannot disable.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The first one I had didn't always charge 2 items at the same time. My husband & I both have iPhone 10 and it doesn't always charge both at the same time. The charging indicator goes both and forth between phone. I informed the company and they replaced it with an upgraded one with is all then now sell. I am very happy with the new device never a problem charging 2 phones at one time. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cool. I keep it on the counter and because it can charge two phones at the same time, really anyone can just drop there phone there. Even the kids when they’re not supposed to be using them. The other advantage here is that when somebody wants to borrow your charger, they don’t have to.
customer_reviews.author: DS Brooks

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Had this item a little now and dont use it anymore. On my note 9 it wont turn itself off like my other one.which is a single charger.i bought this for my night table to charge my buds and phone.it almost fried my buds. They were so hot thougt they might catch fire. And my phone keeps resetting and never rests on the charger ut doesn't seem to turn itself off when its fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: norbert

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This product has frustrated me beyond belief. It sits by my bedside unused most nights. When I’m feeling lucky I’ll set my phone on the pad and move the phone on the pad like a ouija board attempting to find a “sweet spot” so my charging notification pops up on my iPhone XR. I’ll wake up expecting my phone to be freshly charged but alas an uncharged phone sits in my hand. This product is great if you’re a fan of Russian roulette, I myself am not. I did receive this item as a gift from my boyfriend. If I would have know he used my prime account I would have returned. Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: Sese95

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of this chargers on November, didn't work as expected. IBIS owner contacted me personally to apologize and send me a new one completely free! I really appreciate that because the company is showing it is really nice to their customers. The new charger simply works excellent! i really recommend you trying IBIS products!
customer_reviews.author: Heynner Troyo

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it dies on you
customer_reviews.text: Got this charger last year. Worked well for a few months. It was not the fastest wireless charger, but it was easy to use, and fit almost anywhere. It even charged through my phone cases for my galaxy phones. One day it stopped working out of the blue. I tested all three components (charging block, Type C usb cable, and charging station itself). I sourced the problem to the C type port in the station itself. I reached out to the makers here, via email, and their various social platforms. Never got back to me. My only other issue was the width is pretty narrow so bigger devices can slip off the surface if not balanced correctly.
customer_reviews.author: peter v finelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger works well for both my boyfriend and I. Only downside is the bright flashing light that turns on when charging. I'm not sensitive to light––so I actually enjoy it as a night light although I could imagine it being problematic to others that are sensitive to light. Slow to charge too but I imagine that being an issue with wireless charging in general. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: It makes a buzzing sound during regular use
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item I expected better for the price of $40 this thing started buzzing as soon as I put my iPhone on it. It was like a cheap Chinese knock off version of another product. Might even start a fire some where.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge anymore
customer_reviews.text: I had to change review 5 star to 1. When I put my Galaxy s7 on in, a green light is on, but it won't charge at all. I have another Galaxy, it's the same. It happened eventhough I put only one phone. Too bad, I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Paka

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 months...charge cable still works I guess
customer_reviews.text: The charger was great but I bought it back in May 2018 but it broke at the end of September 2018. It only last 4 months but the charge cable still works. The charging pad does not work at all. Hopefully the company sees this review and helps me out. I would be willing to change this review because it is a good product and loved it when it worked. Update: product has been replaced and has been working great. Thanks for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We got this yesterday and it is exactly what we needed, an easy way to charge both mine and my husband’s phone without having to fiddle with our waterproof cases. I can confirm that the item works as expected and even charges through our cases and even with a pop socket in place on my phone (something I was very concerned about when looking for Qi chargers)
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Worked *okay* for almost nine months
customer_reviews.text: Leaving aside that it worked for less than a year, my complaints pretty much echo those of other commenters: the charging lights are quite bright, which isn't great for bedside charging, and you have to be really careful about how you place the phone, or it won't charge. There were a lot of frustrating mornings where my battery was dead after sitting on the pad all night. The positive is that if it was perfectly aligned on the pad, it charged quite quickly and completely. Oh, and it only worked for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Zvi

customer_reviews.title: I normally don't want to leave bad feedback but just want to warn others about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try out this wireless charger with my iPhone X but it wouldn't charge with my case. I took the case off and tried it and still only got the charge to 70% by morning. It was on there for at least 8 hours. I had to return it. I normally don't want to leave bad feedback but just want to warn others about the iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Updated review- Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** 5 stars The seller stands by their product with excellent customer service. I had a replacement within 24 hours of my bringing the issue to their attention. Broke in 40 days. It was always "touchy" about where to put the phone to allow charging, but now one side stopped charging altogether. Very disappointing. I bought a much less expensive single version for my office and it is still running strong.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Holder

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product so far. It charges well. Both my boyfriend and I use it. I have iPhone 8 and he has Samsung galaxy 8 and it works just fine. Originally I was displeased with the item packaging and I spoke to the seller and they were extremely helpful and quick to respond to my complaint! I will add another update in some months on how it is working. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: AK vargas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on the counter. It charges both our phones. Most importantly, we like our phones and don't feel the need to upgrade. This should make them last longer because we don't have to plug them in and potentially wear out the connectors. As far as durability, I am assuming the 5 stars, because I don't foresee a problem, but I have only had this a few days.
customer_reviews.author: BEDUBYA

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents and they LOVE it! No more ugly wires or trying to find the port. So easy to use and looks great on the counter or windowsill in place of long ugly charging cords. Great for households with more than one iPhone who fight over chargers, very attractive and fast to charge! Definitely buying one for myself next
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Ideal dual wireless charging station
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of the IBIS wireless dual charging station last month and its been great. Charges two iPhones fast and without any issues. Size is perfect for placing them on the table or shelf. Weight is pretty light so dropping it would be scary. The design is minimalistic and flattering to the surrounding. So if you're looking for a nice dual charger, this is the one. Contacted Customer service about one of the charging pads we got and they responded fast and was exceptional 10/10. So I would buy this again if I ever need to gift someone or buy a new dual wireless charger.
customer_reviews.author: DVN

customer_reviews.title: WIRELESS CHARGING FOR THE FAMILY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wireless charger so there's a quick, easy spot for me and my visiting family to charge up phones whenever we need to. I keep it in the kitchen, since that's where we usually end up! It's so nice - the IPhones, the Samsungs, whatever, as long as they're able to charge wirelessly, all we have to do is place the phone on the charger and it's up and running. The dual option is nice - no more "can I disconnect yours so I can charge mine?" AND if we want to charge up something that isn't wireless enabled, there's the option for that too! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, low profile, great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because of the LED “on” light. It’s on continuously wether there’s a device charging or not, if this had been a bedside table charger it would be very annoying when trying to sleep, however, we use it for the end table by the couch so it’s ok. Other than that it works great and it’s very low profile. I wish it came in other colors however.
customer_reviews.author: J Sardon

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging with room to expand
customer_reviews.text: This charger works great for my needs — so good in fact, I have two. I appreciate a lot that it offers a USB A plug on the back to allow me to charge my Apple Watch alongside my iPhone and AirPods. While it’s obviously not as fast as wired charging over USB C, it’s more than adequate for dropping my stuff on my desk or side table when I arrive to top off my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Buening

customer_reviews.title: Does not work very well
customer_reviews.text: I got this in June of 2019 and it stopped charging around Nov. 2019. I have tried everything possible but no luck. When I reached out to IBIS, they were extremely quick to respond and told me they would send me a replacement since it was under warranty which I thought was great. But I am yet to receive a replacement and my follow up emails do not get responses any more!
customer_reviews.author: BlueJay

customer_reviews.title: Great product and support!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent response from seller on issue I had. I had an issue with original product and when I sent message to seller, they responded rapidly to address my issue. Ultimately sending me a new device at zero charge. New device is working great, except, I wish it charged more rapidly. I have ensured I am using fast charge adapter as recommended and still don't get as fast a charge as I expected. I expected an hour charge speed, but get more like 2.5 hour charge speed.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Works great - looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger - both using for wireless and wired devices. Also like the design which is much more elegant than a typical charger, and as it sits in a central place in my house - it's important.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT CHARGE ANYTHING! iPhone, air pods, nothing. Tried removing phone cases, repositioning, etc. indicator light would go on and when you wake up in the morning-NOTHING and now you’re stuck with a dead phone. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, quality charging pad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charging pad for my daughter to charge her Airpods (in a wireless charging case) and the Iphone 8 plus and she has had no problems with charging or overheating. It's very easy to place the phone on the pad for charging and has subtle LED's to let you know it's charging (which aren't too bright for nighttime). No issues at all so far (it's been used for about a week). It's a great charging pad that looks, feels and performs like a quality product. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: slewfoot

customer_reviews.title: Good overall sleek and classy white wireless charger.
customer_reviews.text: My first wireless charging pad. Works as described. Wall plug USB adapter just inconvenient based on how the usb power wire sticks straight out unlike an apple wall plug. Only wish they had this same one is a glossy black color Asquith black usb power cord and black usb wall plug.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Product works well if new.
customer_reviews.text: Product works well if it’s new. It charges my 2 iPhone Xs Max and an Apple Watch. After more than a year, one of the charging area does not charge anymore and keeps making a humming sound. Tried sending an email to the seller but never responded. The item doesn’t last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Nash

customer_reviews.title: Pick another
customer_reviews.text: The left side charging worked great but the right side kept cycling and waking up my phone every 3 seconds. That, on top of the misspelling on the box says to me that their attention to detail is not very high.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Loose charging cable and no product support available
customer_reviews.text: It could have been a good product if the charging cable was not loose. if you even touch the charging cable the pad get disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Kochar

customer_reviews.title: Cool unit, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my first one (the cord wouldn't stay connected) So the owner contacted me personally to replace my unit and to appologize for the issue I had. Most people wouldn't take the time but he did. The unit itself works great. Small and sleek to fit on small desks. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Allie L. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a family of different phones
customer_reviews.text: So far the unit has been great we have only had it for about 1 month. The family loves it because you dont have to remove your cover for it to work. The other great thing is we have iPhones and Samsung phones and it works for both. I will purchase another soon.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of the 3 I ordered Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these so far 2 of them have stopped working. It’s past the 30 days so I’m stuck with them and can’t return or exchange so if you want one that you have to replace every month or 2 this is the one for u lol. If you want one that lasts I recommend a different wireless charger.
customer_reviews.author: Moe S

customer_reviews.title: Go Anker
customer_reviews.text: It was fine until it stopped working just outside the return window
customer_reviews.author: Matt W

customer_reviews.title: Great for phone but won’t work for apple watch
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought this one and realized it won’t work for Apple Watch. But this is ok for the phone. I would recommend to buy this one if you are just looking for phone. I loved how they value customer and they are very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Bibek Khadka

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product, Lousy company, Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: What ever you do, don’t buy this piece of CRAP! All of the reviews that you read about the charger breaking after a couple of months are spot on. And the company is nowhere to be found, so don’t believe that you will be able to take advantage of their offered 18 month warranty, because you won’t. Amazon’s should pull this product and the seller for the lousy product as well as the lousy customer service from IBIS.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Product and communication were impeccable!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review just over a year after receiving this item. We have stopped using the product as it not only overheats but last time we plugged it in there were sparks. We use the outlet with other items and have never had any issues. Original review-This company really goes out of there way to make sure the customer is happy. We received a couple correspondence prior to delivery and the messaging was very much on target of what we should expect. When the product arrived it was as described and works very well. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rudavsky

customer_reviews.title: Product is very sturdy compair to the other one I got
customer_reviews.text: Product is very sturdy compair to the other one I got. Input to the device our ver snug, fit well, no dogging around that ends up falling out. This product works well and it’s good. Have a strong charge. Haven’t test the charge speed for my iPhone 8 or plus yet but will soon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised 2
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it as a gift for a family member. It works as advertised; fast wireless charging two Galaxy S7, along with a Kindle from the USB-A port, all at the same time using the provided wall plug and USB-C cable. I mentioned a noticeable constant fluttering noise during wireless charging, and received immediate respond from Afik. A second charger was sent and no noise. I hope this lasts a long time because it's a good looking charging pad.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Tran

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you're money
customer_reviews.text: Awful. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! Bought this for my boyfriend's and my phone. In the beginning our phones would connect and disconnect constantly, waking me up. Then we had problems getting the charger to even realize we put the phone on the charger. Now we cant charge through the wireless part or the wire plug in.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6 months but soon after wouldn't except two phone charging at once. Only charges one phone and only on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A.

customer_reviews.title: ! Keep away !
customer_reviews.text: Works well but makes a lot of disturbing noises. Later on Works only intermittently Very noisy —wines and whistles
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Customer experience is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This wireless charger is not only functional, it is low profile and looks great on my desk. It worked perfectly. I had one hiccup with it, where I thought it wasn't charging. I contacted the seller and I immediately had another at my door 2 days later. I determined that I failed to properly place the phone on the charger. I have a case on my iPhone X and it charges with the case on the phone. The customer service I received, will make me come back and buy again from IBIS.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Doest work very well, have to slowly move phone around to find the “charging spot”. Then while it’s on my night stand it slides off that spot... wake up to a dead phone.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We had this product for just under 90 days and it wouldn't fully charge our iPhone 8s. I wrote a review since it was past the 30-day exchange time and I immediately heard from this company and they did more than enough to make me a satisfied customer. Here's hoping the new one works to our expectations as it's really a convenient device to have.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this a little over a year now. And it give out a super high pitched sound when using the extra usb Plug to charge anything. Fitbit, AirPods, led lights for a bike so bad I have to unplug what I’m charging!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Morales

customer_reviews.title: Only single charging worked after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This product was great when we first got it, unfortunately it only lasted about a week after return deadline. At first it started to take a little longer to find the right location to place the phone for charging and soon it just wouldn’t charge on one of the sides. We went from dual charging to single charging and eventually just stopped working. Price was great, product was worth it but maybe more for limited use not nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I received this charger in 11/2 and had just been using the wireless charging pad until today. I just tried to charge a device using the standard USB port and it did not work. I should have tested it when I received it because now I’ve already discarded to packaging to return it. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: kelly mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Really fits my desktop. it charges both my devices. Airpods charge pretty quickly however for a phone its a bit slower, and sometimes you have to adjust it properly, or it stops charging. The led lights as some people complain don't bother me at all, you can also cover them anytime. There is a small noise from the coils working, however its very small almost unnoticable. Over all 4/5 design is also pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but Barely charges
